title: Graphical Models in ML
description: The course provides an introduction to theory and practice of graphical models in machine learning. It covers three main aspects; representation, probabilistic inference, and learning.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (CS 1371 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 1301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C)
